General.Name: Sichuan Meifeng Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Meifeng Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China. It offers urea, compound fertilizer, nitrogen oxide reducing agents, melamine, nitric acid, ammonium nitrate, carbon dioxide, polymer materials, and other products; and packaging plastic products, as well as liquefied natural gas. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Deyang, China.
